trans-unit.source: Provides access to the security settings for endpoints configured with the named pipe binding.
trans-unit.target: Gir tilgang til sikkerhetsinnstillingene for endepunkt som er konfigurert med bindingen for navngitte datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the security mode for the named pipe binding.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir sikkerhetsmodus for den navngitte datakanal bindingen.

trans-unit.source: Valid values for this property are: - Transport - Use transport-based security.
trans-unit.target: Gyldige verdier for denne egenskapen er: - Transport - Bruk transport kodebasert sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: The default setting uses NTLM which does not provide server authentication.
trans-unit.target: Standardinnstillingen bruker NTLM som ikke inneholder servergodkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode"></xref> for the named pipe binding.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode"> </xref> for den navngitte datakanal bindingen.

trans-unit.source: Returns a a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity.Transport*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity.Transport*>egenskapen er endret fra standardverdien og skal serialiseres.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity.Transport*>

trans-unit.source: This is used by WCF for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: Dette brukes av WCF for XAML integrering.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity.Transport*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity.Transport*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity.Transport*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the transport security for the named pipe binding.
trans-unit.target: Henter transport sikkerheten for den navngitte datakanal bindingen.

trans-unit.source: This method gives access to the <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> for the named pipe transport through <xref:System.ServiceModel.NamedPipeTransportSecurity.ProtectionLevel%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden gir tilgang til den <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>for den navngitte datakanalen transporten via <xref:System.ServiceModel.NamedPipeTransportSecurity.ProtectionLevel%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NamedPipeTransportSecurity.ProtectionLevel%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NamedPipeTransportSecurity"></xref> for the named pipe binding.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NamedPipeTransportSecurity"> </xref> for den navngitte datakanal bindingen.
